instructions: In the Messages app on your Mac, double-click a conversation in the sidebar to open it in its own window. Hold the pointer over the email address or phone number in the To field, click the down arrow , then choose Add To Contacts. Click Contacts in the lower-left corner of the window. Do one of the following: Search for an existing contact card for your friend, select it, edit the contact details, then click Update. Select New Contact, enter the contact details, then click Create. You may not be able to add or edit contacts if you re restricted by communication limits in Screen Time .
